page.title: 02Sport in Cheadle Hulme.
page.content: The{Â£1,250,000 sports centre}based in Cheadle Hulme was opened on August 30th 1983.The sports centre named {"Matchpoint"}has about 3,250 members. The 25 full and part time staff run 8 tennis & 8 badminton courts,13 snooker tables,1 restaurant and 2 bars. The centre is open from 8 am until midnight every day.The peak times are evenings during the week,Saturday mornings and Sunday afternoons. The centre is a major site for competitions.They have too many to list but no competition is televised. It is also a major{coaching centre}in all sports.It costs Â£6,000 per week to run.This gets paid by membership fees and hire charges which are:Â£2 an hour for badminton and snooker;Â£5 an hour for tennis.They plan to build{outside {American-style}tennis courts.
